title: Kandarin headgear 4

properties.value: Kandarin headgear 4 is a reward obtained after completing the elite Kandarin Diary and speaking to The 'Wedge' in Camelot. It has identical stats to a mithril med helm.

Kandarin headgear 4 is a reward obtained after completing the elite Kandarin Diary and speaking to The 'Wedge' in Camelot. It has identical stats to a mithril med helm.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3-1
 Defence bonuses
+10+11+9-1+10
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Contents

  • 1 Benefits
    • 1.1 From Kandarin headgear 1, 2 and 3
    • 1.2 Kandarin headgear 4 only
  • 2 Changes

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Kandarin headgear 1, 2 and 3[edit | edit source]

Active only when worn
  • Extra logs when cutting normal trees anywhere (no additional experience)
Active at all times
  • 15% more marks of grace from Seers' Village Rooftop Course
  • 33% faster spinning at the Seers' Village Spinning wheel
  • Coal trucks hold 308 coal
  • 10% extra experience when cutting maple trees in Seers' Village
  • Option to move Camelot Teleport to just outside the Seers' Village bank
  • 10% more reward points from Barbarian Assault
  • 10% increase to the activation chance for the special effect from enchanted bolts (even in PvP). This bonus stacks additively with other bonuses like the Armadyl crossbow's special attack[1]. For example, if a bolt has a 10% chance of activating naturally, then after completing the hard diary the chance will become 11%. As of 16 April 2015 you no longer need to equip the headgear for this effect.
  • Functions as a light source (does not need to be worn)
  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 10 January 2022. (Archived from the original on 11 January 2022.) Mod Ash: "The diary reward adds an extra 10% of the base chance."

Kandarin headgear 4 only[edit | edit source]

  • Thormac will enchant battlestaves for 20k rather than 30k/40k (coins)
  • The Flax keeper will exchange 250 noted flax daily for 250 noted bow strings
  • The first 200 coal placed in the coal trucks every day are transported to your bank
  • Unlimited teleports to Sherlock
  • 50% discount from Otto when converting Zamorakian spears into hastae
  • 15% higher yield from the Catherby herb patch

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
21 May 2015
(update | poll)

Kandarin headgear 4 now has unlimited teleports to Sherlock.

16 April 2015
(update)

The 'Wedge' now refers to Kandarin headgears as headgear rather than headband.

[[File:Kandarin headgear 4 chathead.png|left]]
'''Kandarin headgear 4''' is a reward obtained after completing the elite [[Kandarin Diary]] and speaking to [[The 'Wedge']] in [[Camelot]]. It has identical stats to a [[mithril med helm]].

{{Infobox Bonuses
|astab = 0
|aslash = 0
|acrush = 0
|amagic = -3
|arange = -1
|dstab = +10
|dslash = +11
|dcrush = +9
|dmagic = -1
|drange = +10

}}

==Benefits==
===From [[Kandarin headgear 1]], [[Kandarin headgear 2|2]] and [[Kandarin headgear 3|3]]===
;Active '''only when worn'''
*Extra [[logs]] when cutting normal [[tree]]s anywhere (no additional experience)

;Active '''at all times'''
*15% more [[marks of grace]] from [[Seers' Village Rooftop Course]]
*33% faster spinning at the [[Seers' Village]] [[Spinning wheel]]

*[[Coal trucks]] hold 308 [[coal]]
*10% extra experience when cutting [[maple tree]]s in Seers' Village
*Option to move [[Camelot Teleport]] to just outside the [[Seers' Village#Bank|Seers' Village bank]]
*10% more reward points from [[Barbarian Assault]]
*10% increase to the activation chance for the special effect from enchanted bolts (<u>even in PvP</u>). This bonus stacks additively with other bonuses like the [[Armadyl crossbow]]'s special attack{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1480491964260925444|date=10 January 2022|archiveurl=https://archive.is/Z96RM|archivedate=11 January 2022|quote=The diary reward adds an extra 10% of the base chance.}}. For example, if a bolt has a 10% chance of activating naturally, then after completing the hard diary the chance will become 11%. As of [[16 April]] [[2015]] you no longer need to equip the headgear for this effect.
*Functions as a [[light source]] (does not need to be worn)
{{Reflist}}

===Kandarin headgear 4 only===
*[[Thormac]] will enchant [[battlestaves]] for 20k rather than 30k/40k ([[coins]])
*The [[Flax keeper]] will exchange 250 noted flax daily for 250 noted [[bow string]]s
*The first 200 [[coal]] placed in the [[coal trucks]] every day are transported to your [[bank]]
*Unlimited teleports to [[Sherlock]]
*50% discount from [[Otto Godblessed|Otto]] when converting [[Zamorakian spear]]s into [[Zamorakian hasta|hastae]]
*15% higher yield from the [[Catherby]] [[herb patch]]
==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 24 March 2016
|update = White & Black Graceful
|poll = Old School Content Poll 40: Vanilla LootShare & QoL
|change = *It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 21 May 2015
|update = World Switcher & RotG (i)
|poll = Old School Content Poll 33
|change = Kandarin headgear 4 now has unlimited teleports to Sherlock.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 16 April 2015
|update = Clan Wars Game Modes & More
|change = The 'Wedge' now refers to Kandarin headgears as headgear rather than headband.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}
